inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the command to execute (e.g., 'Generate' or 'Build').

inputs.name: containerRegistry
inputs.label: Container Registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify your container registry to publish the generated images to.
inputs.visibleRule: command == init || command == build || command == generate

inputs.name: containerRepositoryPrefix
inputs.label: Container Repository Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the repository prefix.
inputs.visibleRule: command == init || command == build || command == generate

inputs.name: containerImageTag
inputs.label: Container Image Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the container image tag.
inputs.visibleRule: command == init || command == build || command == generate

inputs.name: privateRegistry
inputs.label: Private Registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables usage of a private registry, which will produce an image pull secret.

inputs.name: privateRegistryUrl
inputs.label: Private Registry URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL for the private registry.

inputs.name: privateRegistryUsername
inputs.label: Private Registry Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username for the private registry. This is required if passing --private-registry.

inputs.name: privateRegistryPassword
inputs.label: Private Registry Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the private registry. This is required if passing --private-registry.

inputs.name: privateRegistryEmail
inputs.label: Private Registry Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email for the private registry. This is purely optional and will default to aspirate@aspirate.com.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the working directory.

inputs.name: containerBuilder
inputs.label: Container Builder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the container builder, the default is docker
inputs.visibleRule: command == init || command == build || command == generate

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the output format (e.g., 'compose' or 'kubernetes').

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the output directory. Defaults to ./aspirate-output.

inputs.name: nonInteractive
inputs.label: Non Interactive
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable the interactive mode, default is true for pipelines.
inputs.visibleRule: command == generate || command == build || command == init

inputs.name: includeDashboard
inputs.label: Include Dashboard
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable aspire dashboard, default is true for pipelines.

inputs.name: disableSecrets
inputs.label: Disable Secrets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable secrets, default is true for pipelines.
inputs.visibleRule: command == generate || command == build || command == apply || command == destroy

inputs.name: imagePullPolicy
inputs.label: Image Pull Policy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The image pull policy to use for all containers in generated manifests. For your local docker desktop cluster, use IfNotPresent.

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.label: Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generates a Kubernetes Namespace resource, and applies the namespace to all generated resources. Will be used at deployment time.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides auto-generated values for input parameters. Format here is comma seperated key value pair, example: postgres-password=postgres,value2=value

inputs.name: skipFinal
inputs.label: Skip final
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skips The final generation of the kustomize manifest, which is the parent top level file.

inputs.name: inputPath
inputs.label: Input path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path for the kustomize manifests directory. Defaults to ./aspirate-output.

inputs.name: kubeContext
inputs.label: Kube context
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the kubernetes context within your kubeconfig to apply / deploy manifests to.

inputs.name: rollingRestart
inputs.label: Rolling restart
inputs.helpMarkDown: Perform a rollout restart of deployments directly after applying the manifests. Defaults to false.
